AD_WINDOW.NAME: Tables and Columns
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Edit tables and columns so that Openbravo can access the database, as well as control the role access.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Edit tables and columns so that Openbravo can access the database, as well as control the role access.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Reference
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Edit standard data types such as strings, integers, lists as well as custom data types.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Edit standard data types such as strings, integers, lists as well as custom data types.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Windows, Tabs, and Fields
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit windows, tabs, and fields according to your business preferences.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit windows, tabs, and fields according to your business preferences.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Validation Setup
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit the validation setup to be used for columns of tables.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit the validation setup to be used for columns of tables.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Message
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit application initiated information and error messages.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit application initiated information and error messages.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Menu
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Edit the application menu tree structure according to your business necessities.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Edit the application menu tree structure according to your business necessities.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Language
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define multiple languages to be used in the application.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define multiple languages to be used in the application.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Matched Invoices
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Edit and process purchase orders by assigning them to a corresponding shipment/receipt, invoice, or both.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Edit and process purchase orders by assigning them to a corresponding shipment/receipt, invoice, or both.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: User
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create users and manage user roles to give access permissions.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create users and manage user roles to give access permissions.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Client
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define client characteristics, additional information, and defaults.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define client characteristics, additional information, and defaults.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Organization
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create organizations and manage the organizational structure according to your business necessities.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create organizations and manage the organizational structure according to your business necessities.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Role
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create roles with assigned users, and edit roles access to organizations, windows, processes, etc.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create roles with assigned users, and edit roles access to organizations, windows, processes, etc.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Document Sequence
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define an auto numbering system to uniquely identify document types.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define an auto numbering system to uniquely identify document types.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Workflow
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define workflows that guide users through steps required to complete a specified task.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define workflows that guide users through steps required to complete a specified task.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Task
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define tasks to be used in the application for selected roles.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define tasks to be used in the application for selected roles.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Currency
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define currencies and conversion rates to be used in the application.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define currencies and conversion rates to be used in the application.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Conversion Rates
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define conversion rates to be used for currencies defined in the application.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define conversion rates to be used for currencies defined in the application.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Fiscal Calendar
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create multiple fiscal calendars and periods for accounting purposes.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create multiple fiscal calendars and periods for accounting purposes.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Account Tree
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit account elements and add them to your defined chart of accounts or account trees.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit account elements and add them to your defined chart of accounts or account trees.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Unit of Measure
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create units of measure and conversions rates to be applied to products.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create units of measure and conversions rates to be applied to products.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Location
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define addresses or service points of your organizations.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define addresses or service points of your organizations.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Country Region and City
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define countries with regions and cities to be used in the application.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define countries with regions and cities to be used in the application.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Business Partner
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit business partner information, templates, and bank accounts.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit business partner information, templates, and bank accounts.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Accounting Schema
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit multiple accounting schemas and assign them account elements; define DB tables to be included in the accounting processes, and define the GL accounts to be used by default.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit multiple accounting schemas and assign them account elements; define DB tables to be included in the accounting processes, and define the GL accounts to be used by default.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Test
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: View an example of a window that shows fields with all possible references or data types.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: View an example of a window that shows fields with all possible references or data types.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Attachment
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Attachments
AD_WINDOW.HELP: For System Maintenance Only. The Maintain Attachments window is used for diagnostic purposes to display the attributes of an attachment.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Preference
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit extremely restrictive values for a specified user, window, or for the entire application.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit extremely restrictive values for a specified user, window, or for the entire application.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Multiphase Project
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit projects and tasks potentially requiring sales invoicing.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit projects and tasks potentially requiring sales invoicing.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: G/L Category
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define G/L Categories to be used in the General Ledger.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define G/L Categories to be used in the General Ledger.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: G/L Journal
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit manual G/L journal entries.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit manual G/L journal entries.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: ABC Activity
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define activities for which you are interested in managing costs.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define activities for which you are interested in managing costs.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Document Type
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and manage document types to be used for all application transactions.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and manage document types to be used for all application transactions.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Approval
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Approvals
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Maintain Approvals Window is used to define the different approvals that are used in workflows.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Tax Rate
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create tax rates to be used in application transactions.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create tax rates to be used in application transactions.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Tax Category
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create tax categories to manage tax rates with similar characteristics or attributes.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create tax categories to manage tax rates with similar characteristics or attributes.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Warehouse and Storage Bins
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create warehouses and organize them using storage bins.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create warehouses and organize them using storage bins.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Product
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create products and manage the related costing, purchasing, and pricing setup.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create products and manage the related costing, purchasing, and pricing setup.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Payment Term
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define payment terms to be used for business partners taking part in transactions.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define payment terms to be used for business partners taking part in transactions.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Shipping Company
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create shipping companies and define freight costs to be used in products logistics.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create shipping companies and define freight costs to be used in products logistics.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Sales Order
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create orders tracking product sales to customers.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create orders tracking product sales to customers.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Product Category
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create product categories to better organize your products and create more powerful reports.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create product categories to better organize your products and create more powerful reports.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Price List
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit price lists and versions to optionally apply specified product prices to individual business partners.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit price lists and versions to optionally apply specified product prices to individual business partners.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Invoice Schedule
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define invoice schedules to be used for business partners.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define invoice schedules to be used for business partners.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Sales Campaign
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create specific sales campaigns to be used in sales operations.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create specific sales campaigns to be used in sales operations.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Sales Channel
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create specific sales channels to be used in sales operations.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create specific sales channels to be used in sales operations.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Element
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Edit the central repository of application elements to update field name descriptions and help/comments.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Edit the central repository of application elements to update field name descriptions and help/comments.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Sales Region
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create sales regions to be used in sales operations.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create sales regions to be used in sales operations.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Account Combination
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create accounting combinations to be used in Openbravo's accounting process.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create accounting combinations to be used in Openbravo's accounting process.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: GL Budget
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain General Ledger Budgets

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Bank
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define banks and the related accounts.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define banks and the related accounts.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Dunning
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Dunning Levels
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Dunning Window defines the parameters that will be used when generating Dunning Letters. Each customer can be associated with a Dunning Code.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Withholding (1099)
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Withholding Certificates
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Withholding Window defines the rule used for calculating withholding amounts.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Charge
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Charges
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Charges Window defines the different charges that may be incurred. These can include Bank Charges, Vendor Charges and Handling Charges.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Accounting Transaction Details
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: View detailed general ledger entries for a specified time period.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: View detailed general ledger entries for a specified time period.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Tree and Node Image
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Defines the descriptions and images that will be used when a tree is displayed.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Defines the descriptions and images that will be used when a tree is displayed.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Report and Process
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define and edit reports and processes (database or Java).
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define and edit reports and processes (database or Java).

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Sales Invoice
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit sales invoices for your customers.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit sales invoices for your customers.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Physical Inventory
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit inventory counts and update your stock quantities.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit inventory counts and update your stock quantities.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Goods Shipment
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and manage goods shipments to your customers.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and manage goods shipments to your customers.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Goods Movements
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit internal inventory movements among warehouses and storage bins.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit internal inventory movements among warehouses and storage bins.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Import Business Partner
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Import business partners in .csv format from previously used databases/applications and past business operations.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Import business partners in .csv format from previously used databases/applications and past business operations.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Revenue Recognition
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Revenue Recognition Rules
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Revenue Recognition Window defines the intervals at which revenue will be recognized. Alternatively, the revenue recognition may be linked to service levels provided.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Perpetual Inventory
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Perpetual Inventory Rules
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Perpetual Inventory defines the rules to be applied when generating Physical Inventory counts.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Vendor Details
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Edit available product information grouped by the vendors who sell them.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Edit available product information grouped by the vendors who sell them.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Title
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define titles to be used to address a business partner.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define titles to be used to address a business partner.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Report View
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Report Views
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Report View Window defines the views used when generating reports. This window is for System Admin use only.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Purchase Order
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit orders to buy products from suppliers.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit orders to buy products from suppliers.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Purchase Invoice
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit invoices received from your vendors and generate related goods receipts.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit invoices received from your vendors and generate related goods receipts.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Goods Receipt
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit goods receipts from your vendors and create invoices from these receipts.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit goods receipts from your vendors and create invoices from these receipts.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: EDI Definition
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain EDI Definition
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The EDI Definition Window defines the parameters to be used when processing EDI Transactions

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Form
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit forms (manual windows) to be used in the application.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit forms (manual windows) to be used in the application.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Error Message
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Display Error Messages
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Error Message Window displays all error messages generated. This is for System Admin use only. The records must be manually deleted.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Import Loader Format
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define the file layout for product information which will be imported.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define the file layout for product information which will be imported.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Tire Storage
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain storage of tires

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Bill of Materials Production
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and run production processes using the previously defined bills of materials.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and run production processes using the previously defined bills of materials.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Business Partner Category
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit information related to similar business partners at one time by grouping them.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit information related to similar business partners at one time by grouping them.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Notice
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit messages to appear while performing processes.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit messages to appear while performing processes.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Bank Statement
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: View your bank statements against transactions created and edited in the application.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: View your bank statements against transactions created and edited in the application.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Custom Attribute
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain custom entity attributes
AD_WINDOW.HELP: This is a System only Window. Customer Attributes allow the entry of additional information to an entity.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Cashbook
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create cashbooks to manage all cash movements which occur in the cash journal.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create cashbooks to manage all cash movements which occur in the cash journal.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Cash Journal
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Add individual cash transactions to be managed and viewed in the cashbook.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Add individual cash transactions to be managed and viewed in the cashbook.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Field Category
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Edit the subsection field group properties of tabs.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Edit the subsection field group properties of tabs.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Request
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Work on your requests
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Request Window is used to define and track any request assigned to you.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Request Processor
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define Request Processors
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Request Processor Window allows you to define different processes that you want to occur and the frequency and timing of these processes

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Mail Template
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Mail Template

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Commission
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define how and when you want commissions to be calculated and to whom they are to be paid.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define how and when you want commissions to be calculated and to whom they are to be paid.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Project Reporting
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Project Reporting Cycles
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Project Cycle Window defines the steps associated with a specific Project.You may want to define several Project cycles to differentiate the different types of projects. Project cycles may use all or a subset of the used Project Status (e.g. Your opportunity project cycle may include the steps from prospect to contract - the service cycle may include steps from installation to customer acceptance.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Commission Payment
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create commissions and create corresponding invoices.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create commissions and create corresponding invoices.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Performance Color
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Color used for Performance Analysis
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Performance Color Window allows you to define the color schema to be used to indicate current performance. The system has predefined Red (below 50%), Yellow (below 100%) and green above 100. If you want to define your own color schema, do it here.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Performance Goal
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define Performance Goals
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Performance Goal Window allows you to define performance goals

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Performance Measure Calculation
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define how you calculate your performance measures
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Please test the statement in SQL*Plus first.The select statement needs to return a single value!Any restrictions for Date range, Organizations, Business Partners, Products should be done via the "Performance Measure" window. This is the generic calculation.As this tends to be somewhat technical, the system has a few examples predefined.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Performance Achievement
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define Performance Achievements
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Performance Achievement Window allows you to define Tasks to be achieved. The performance is measured by the percentage of reached achievements.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Performance Measure
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define your Performance Measures
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Performance Measure Window allows you to define the rules and restrictions for performance measurement. You can, for example, restrict performance measurement to sales for a certain product category for a defined time frame.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Financial Report
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Financial Reports
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Financial Reports are the combination of a Report Column Set and Line Set.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Report Column Set
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Financial Report Column Sets
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Report Column Set defines what data is printed in the columns of a report.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Report Line Set
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Financial Report Line Sets
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Line Set determines, which lines are printed in a Financial Report

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Revenue Recognition Run
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Start Revenue Recognition

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Service Level
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Service Levels
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Service Levels are generated when an invoice with products based on revenue recognition rules are generated. You need to update the actual service level by adding an additional line.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Find (indirect use)
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Find Dialog (indirect use)

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Goods Transaction
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: View all goods transactions carried out in the application.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: View all goods transactions carried out in the application.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Print Form
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Print Forms (Invoices, Checks, ..) used
AD_WINDOW.HELP:
Define the documents you use for this Client/Organnization. Note that the check format is defined in the Bank (Account) Window.

The highest priotity has the Print Format, you define on a Document Type (example specific Export Invoice format). The next level is the set of Print Formats, you defined for the organziation of the document printed. The default is the set of Print Formats defines for all organizations of the Client (Organization=*).

AD_WINDOW.NAME: System Color
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain System Colors
AD_WINDOW.HELP: System colors are used for background and indicators

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Desktop
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Desktop
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Desktop is a collection of Workbenches

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Import Bank Statement
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Import Bank Statements
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Allows the bank statement import configuration and its execution

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Import G/L Journal
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Import G/L jounals in .csv format from previously used databases/applications and past business operations.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: You way want to check the balance of the import with "Validate Only" before importing. Unbalanced Journals are imported; the handling is based on your settings for the posting process.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Import Invoices
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Import invoices in .csv format from previously used databases/applications and past business operations.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Allows the invoice import configuration and its execution

AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Import orders in .csv format from previously used databases/applications and past business operations.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Import orders in .csv format from previously used databases/applications and past business operations.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Freight Category
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define freight categories to be used by shippers.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define freight categories to be used by shippers.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Accounting Dimension
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit accounting dimensions to be used in dimensional reports.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit accounting dimensions to be used in dimensional reports.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Replication
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Data Replication Targets
AD_WINDOW.HELP:
Data Replication Target Details. Set up your system completely on the central system, before setting up the replication. Define the Replication target here and export the database and import it on the remote system.

Before(!) entering transactions, Start the Replication Run to set up the remote system.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Replication Strategy
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Data Replication Strategy
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Data Replication Strategy determines which tables and how they are replicated. Note that the migration does not syncronize Application Dictionary items.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Service Project
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Create and edit projects and tasks potentially requiring purchase and sales invoicing.
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit projects and tasks potentially requiring purchase and sales invoicing.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Knowledge Category
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Knoweledge Categories and Values
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Set up knowledge categories and values as a search aid. Examples are Release Version, Product Area, etc. Knowledge Category values act like keyworks.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Knowledge Base
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Knowledge Base
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Maintain Type, Topics, Entries and theit Comments, Categories, Related Entries

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Knowledge Source
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Source of Knowledge Entries
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Source of a Knowlegde Entry is a pointer to the originating system. The Knowledge Entry has an additional entry (Description URL) for more detailed info.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Knowledge Synonym
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Knowlege Keyword Synonym
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Search Synonyms for Knowledge Keywords; Example: Product = Item

AD_WINDOW.HELP: View information related to business partner orders, receipts/shipments, invoices, and assets.

AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define values of a selected field, depending on the tab that is being edited.

AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create sales orders quickly using predefined product templates.

AD_WINDOW.HELP: Edit payments by summing one or many into one or by dividing one into many. Here you manage payments that come from invoices generated in the application.

AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit payments with no corresponding document/transaction in the application.

AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit remittance types with corresponding parameters according to your business needs.

AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define quality control check points to be used for testing the product quality at any point in the production process.

AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit measurements and report findings at predefined checkpoints. The goal is to ensure output quality during production.

AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define checkpoints and their frequencies to be used in the Quality Control Report.

AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define checkpoints to be used for quality control of a produced product.

AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and edit data collection and measurements related to quality control. This is done at predefined checkpoints for a produced product.
